name: Application rejected: marriage not broken down (app 2)
body:
You did not agree that your ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)) has irretrievably broken down and so you cannot apply ((isDivorce??for a divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership)).  

Your ((partner)) has been sent an email confirming that you did not agree with the statement, and so could not join the application. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Application ((isDivorce??for your divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership))
